name: Bynd
tag_list: social, social-engagement, solomo, api, b2b, b2b2b, affiliates, facebook, twitter, linkedin, apps, html5, jquerymobile
overview:
Bynd is a social commerce platform that engages customers, broadcasts your brand and drives revenue by making websites and apps social.

We offer apps for Travel, Retail and Media businesses, all based on a rich and robust API. These apps run on iOS and Android phones and tablets, and they use SoLoMo devices like location-based services, social discovery and social login to lure customers to your brand and products, keep them socially engaged, and keep them coming back. And the apps can be private-labeled.
